item.title: Word Ladder
item.description:
Built a game using Lovable, a vibe-coding AI platform, this weekend.

Lovable organized AI Showdown during the weekend where users can build projects and compete using code-generating AI Models from OpenAI, Anthropic and Google.

As part of my project, I have created a simple word ladder game, where the player can only change only single letter in each rung to add a valid English word. The game is to change the existing word one letter at a time into the target word.

Below is an embedded version of the Word Ladder game hosted externally on lovable.app.
